rukus.text: nun yeonpilgwa geudeul-ui gilog-e geol-eo maengsehasa
geudaega michinjaga anin geos-eun junim-ui eunhyeloseo
jinsillo geudaeegeneun han-eobsneun bosang-i jueojilila
sillo geudaeneun gosanghan seongpum-ui soyujalo
meoji anh-a geudaedo alge doel geos-imyeo jeodeuldo alge doelila
neohui jung-e nuga michin jainyo
sillo geudae junim-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo banghwanghaneun jawa bog-eum-eul bad adeul-ineun jadeul-eul gajang jal asineun bun-isila
geuleomeulo jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ege giul-iji malla
geudeul-i sun-eunghaneun cheog hamyeo geu daega sun-eunghagileul geudeul-eun wonhago issnola
biyeolhan geudeul-ui maengsee gwileul giulji malla
geudeul-eun jungsangmolyaghaneun jadeullo bibanghago baehoehamyeonseo
modeun seonhaeng-eul banghaehago yeong-yeog eul neom-eo joeag-e gip-i ppajin jadeullo
nanpoghago jan-inhani modeun geos i jeojuseuleon taesaeng-ila
ineun geuga jaemulgwa manh-eun jasondeul-eul gajyeossgi ttaemun-inyo
hananim-ui malsseum-i geuege gye sidoel ttaemada geugeos-eun yes seonjodeul-eun uhwadeul-ilago malhayeossdeola
hananim-eun kosdeung-e nag-in-eul jjig eo dulila
achim-e gwasuwon-ui gwail-eul su hwaghalyeo gyeolsimhaess-eul ttae gwasuwon salam deul-eul siheomhaessdeus-i hananim-eun geudeul-eul siheomhanola
geuleona geudeul-eun eunhyeleul bepulji ani haess-euni
geudeul-i jamdeun saie junim-eulobuteo geu jeong-won-e jaeang-i iss-eossno la
geulihayeo geu jeong-won-eun geom-eun bulmojiga doeeo beolyeoss-euni
achim-i doemae geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege soli jileudeola
gwail-eul suhwagkoja handamyeon a chim iljjig gwasuwon-eulo nagala hani
geudeul-eun tteonamyeo naj-eun bimil-ui mogsolilo sogsag-ideola
oneul-eun gananbaeng-iga dangsin-ui gwasuwon-e deul-eo oji moshadolog ha la
geulihayeo geudeul-eun geuleohge jag jeonghago achim iljjig pihayeo tteonass deola
geudeul-i gwasuwon-eul boass-eul ttae uliga gil-eul ilh-eossdoda lago geudeul eun malhamyeo
sillo ulineun keuge ppaeasgin jadeul-iyo lago hadeola
geudeul jung-e boda jeongjighaessdeon jaga wae hananim-eul chan-yanghaji ani haessneunya naega neohuiege malhaji ani haessdeonyo lago hamae
junimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo sil lo jeohuiga saaghan jadeul-ieossseubnidalago malhanola
geuttae geudeul-eun seologa seololeul binanhamyeo
sillo uliga saaghan jadeul-i eoss-euni bichamhal ppun-ilago malhago
junimkkeseo igeosboda deo joh-eun geos-eulo bakkueo jusil geos-iyo sillo ulineun geubunkke hoegaehadoda lago malhadeola
geuleoham-i hyeonse-ui beol-ila neo huiga algo issdamyeon naese-ui eungbeol-eun deoug keunila
